SELECT M.REP_TEAM_CODE , M.REP_CODE , M.COM_NO , M.DEPT_CODE , M.CIR_CODE , M.DEPT_NAME , M.COM_JOBX_CODE , M.COM_POSITION_CODE , M.BELT_CODE , REP_TEAM_MEM_NAME , REP_TEAM_MEM_EDU_CODE , REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE , REP_TEAM_REG_USER , REP_TEAM_REG_DATE , REP_TEAM_UPDATE_USER , REP_TEAM_UPDATE_DATE , REP_TEAM_MEM_STATUS
, CD_ROLE.CODE_NM AS REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE_NM , CD_JOB.CODE_NM AS COM_JOBX_NM , CD_POS.CODE_NM AS COM_POSITION_NM , '' as REP_TEAM_MEM_EDU_NM , CD_BT.CODE_NM as BELT_NM FROM TB_REPORT_TEAM M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_MST U ON U.COM_NO=M.COM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_ROLE ON CD_ROLE.CODE_ID=M.REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE AND CD_ROLE.CODE_GRP_ID='REP_ROLE' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_JOB ON CD_JOB.CODE_ID=M.COM_JOBX_CODE AND CD_JOB.CODE_GRP_ID='JOBX' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_POS ON CD_POS.CODE_ID=M.COM_POSITION_CODE AND CD_POS.CODE_GRP_ID='POSITION' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_BT ON CD_BT.CODE_ID=M.BELT_CODE AND CD_BT.CODE_GRP_ID='LDRBELT'
ORDER BY REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE ASC, REP_TEAM_REG_DATE ASC

SELECT CIR_MEM_CODE , CIR_CODE , M.COM_NO , DEPT_CODE , GET_DEPART_NM(DEPT_CODE) DEPT_NAME , COM_JOBX_CODE , GET_CODE_NM('JOBX', COM_JOBX_CODE) COM_JOBX_NM , COM_POSITION_CODE , GET_CODE_NM('POSITION', COM_POSITION_CODE) COM_POSITION_NM , BELT_CODE , GET_CODE_NM('LDRBELT', BELT_CODE) BELT_NM , CIR_MEM_NAME as REP_TEAM_MEM_NAME , CIR_MEM_EDU_CODE as REP_TEAM_MEM_EDU_CODE , CIR_MEM_ROLE as REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE , CASE WHEN CIR_MEM_ROLE='LEADER' THEN '조장' ELSE '조원' END AS REP_TEAM_MEM_ROLE_NM , CIR_REG_USER as REP_TEAM_REG_USER , CIR_REG_DATE as REP_TEAM_REG_DATE , CIR_UPDATE_USER as REP_TEAM_UPDATE_USER , CIR_UPDATE_DATE as REP_TEAM_UPDATE_DATE , CIR_MEM_STATUS as REP_TEAM_MEM_STATUS FROM TB_CIRCLE_DETAIL M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_MST U ON U.COM_NO=M.COM_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_ROLE ON CD_ROLE.CODE_ID=M.CIR_MEM_ROLE AND CD_ROLE.CODE_GRP_ID='REP_ROLE' --LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_JOB ON CD_JOB.CODE_ID=M.COM_JOBX_CODE AND CD_JOB.CODE_GRP_ID='JOBX' --LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_POS ON CD_POS.CODE_ID=M.COM_POSITION_CODE AND CD_POS.CODE_GRP_ID='POSITION' --LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE CD_BT ON CD_BT.CODE_ID=M.BELT_CODE AND CD_BT.CODE_GRP_ID='LDRBELT'
ORDER BY CIR_MEM_ROLE ASC, CIR_REG_DATE ASC
